nRdconfig_t Struct Reference

#include <nRouted.h>


Data Fields

Detailed Description

Struct for configuration data.

The nRdconfig_t struct contains fields for all the relevant configuration information for nRouted.

Field Documentation

char nRdconfig_t::wdir[128]

Character array containing the working directory path. Default: "/tmp/nRouted/"

char nRdconfig_t::serialport[128]

Character array containing the path to serial port device to use. Default: "/dev/ttyS0"

int nRdconfig_t::uselogging

Whether to log events in to log file. 0=NO, 1=YES. Default: 1

int nRdconfig_t::loglevel

The amount of information that is logged. 0=low (only starting, exiting and errors are logged), 1=medium (some additional information is also logged), 2=high (extensive logging, almost every action is logged. Be careful with logfile size). Default: 0

char nRdconfig_t::logfile[128]

Character array containing the path to the nRouted logfile. Default: "/var/log/nRouted.log"

int nRdconfig_t::tcpport

The TCP port number to listen for connections. Default: 21780

char nRdconfig_t::tcpaddr[32]

The address of the interface where to bind the TCP server.

int nRdconfig_t::tcpallowmulti

Whether to allow multiple TCP connections from the same IP address. 0=no 1=yes. Default: 1

int nRdconfig_t::tcpmaxconn

The maximum number of simultaneous TCP connections. Default: 1

int nRdconfig_t::serialbufsize

How many packets should the serial server sendbuffer have space for. Default: 20

int nRdconfig_t::protocol

Protocol to register

int nRdconfig_t::channel

Radio channel

unsigned int nRdconfig_t::gw_adv_period

GW advertisement period in ms
